A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really enjoyed the movie and have been twice already within 4 days - both times a 3D showing\, which never happens with me!  There's so much to consider in this movie!  I haven't been this emotional about a Star Wars movie in years.  There are parts that didn't land well with me\, but more that I was either delighted by or shocked and amazed. I haven't had the urge to discuss what I've seen in a Star Wars movie in a long time\, but I want to talk to everyone I know about The Last Jedi\, to see what they think.  I enjoyed The Force Awakens\, but I didn't have this 'need to discuss' reaction with that film.  I highly recommend not only seeing the film\, but seeing it more than once because to take it all in.
